item.title: Removed
item.dc:creator: @dan_v_jad dan v jad
item.description:
@dan_v_jad wrote:

you cant ill send you how in a second. here it is

Ah putting in an image =)
Simple!
Okay, well hopefully you know how to take screenshots
If you dont…

screenshots
-just press PRINT SCR (should be above insert key on keyboard)
when you want the pic to be taken
-open Microsoft PAINT or any pic editing thing you got
-paste into PAINT, and voila! You’ve got your pic.

okay
now you have to upload it through an image hosting site
like www.photobucket.com - create a photobucket account and upload your picture that you made. Now, copy the URL that they give you when you get your pic uploaded, and paste that into your Moparscape Post.

When you put the URL in the post surround it with
it should look like this

then post it and it worked!

Good luck!
–<<((br0k3n))>>–

i got this from owner of broken scape thats why it has (–<<((br0k3n))>>–)
